title: Addition Binomial Square Formula
text: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula: $${\left(a+b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$.
speech: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula:  parentheses a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared .

title: Plug in the Terms
text: Substitute $$a=2q$$ and $$b=\frac{1}{3}$$ into the addition binomial square formula:\n$${\left(a+b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$\n$${\left(2q+\frac{1}{3}\right)}^2={\left(2q\right)}^2+\frac{2\times2q\times1}{3}+{\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)}^2$$
speech: Substitute  a is equal to, 2 q  and  b, is equal to 1 third  into the addition binomial square formula:\n, parentheses a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared \n parentheses, 2 q plus 1 third,  squared is equal to parentheses 2 q  squared plus fraction, 2 times 2 q times 1, over 3,  plus, parentheses 1 third  squared
